contextId.information: AT: "I have been crying for help for a long time, but you act as though you do not hear me!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: how long shall I cry for help, and you will not hear?

contextId.information: AT: "You are eternal, Yahweh my God, my Holy One." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: Are you not from ancient times, Yahweh my God, my Holy One?

contextId.information: This question was asked in order to make the Chaldeans think about the answer. "The ones who are angry at you will come against you, the ones you are afraid of will begin to attack" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: Will the ones biting at you not rise up suddenly, and the ones terrifying you awaken
